name: Atomark Email Newsletter Service API
tagline: This api is used for connecting to Atomic Newsletter Service by Atompark Software
body:
### Email Newsletter Service PHP API

A PHP library which allows to connect to [Atomic Email-Newsletter Service](http://www.massmailsoftware.com/email-newsletter-service/)

Now you can integrate Atomic Email Service features into your projects. Using our [API gateway](http://www.massmailsoftware.com/emailservice/api/api.php), you can send e-newsletters, create address books, manage mailing lists, and personalize each e-mail message right from within your project.
[ API description >>](http://www.massmailsoftware.com/emailservice/api/api.php)

You can see an example of complete API integration in the [Usage Example](http://www.massmailsoftware.com/emailservice/api/php-v3-example.php) section, with step-by-step instructions using the PHP language.

Expert Atomic Newsletter Service integration can make automate your e-mail marketing. Everything you need, like mailing list synchronization, requires minimum user intervention. For example:

* Checking the continued relevance of the mailing lists under the current CRM
* Development of separate structures for e-mail newsletters sent to Internet portals
* Continuous updating of subscriber lists, taking into account new online shop customers' email addresses
* Support for working with statistical analysis systems and data mining
